text:
(Practice is going smoothly...
But I still feel like something's missing...!)

Since we're all gathered here like this,
I want to do something together!

The Producer seems busy,
so maybe I should come up with something...?

Hmm, I thought it was a lovely little bird chirping,
but... Would you mind sharing your story with me too?

Sakuya!
Oops, sorry... Did I speak out loud?

It's okay, there's no one here but us, so...
I thought I heard something about planning, though.

Yeah! Since it's not often we get to have
joint training camps with the other units...

I thought it would be nice to not only
practice, but also have some fun together.

I see...
Hehe, actually, I've been thinking the same thing.

Yeah, this training camp will become a memorable experience for everyone.
So, wouldn't it be nice to have one or two recreational activities?

Exactly, that's right...!
Hey, Sakuya, do you have any good ideas...!?

I've thought about a few things, but I'm having trouble
deciding. If you'd like, shall we discuss it together?
Hehe, I'm glad to have a supportive ally like you.

Me too! Alright, let's come up with a great
plan together and surprise everyone!
